description: Privately talk to Tina to understand what’s going on with Amy. Find out the root cause of her behavior — she may be projecting hurt from home.
Publicly respond to Amy by calling out her masked insults. Make it clear this isn’t real leadership — it’s performative cruelty.
Publicly encourage Sophia and offer genuine support. Let her know she's seen and valued even if Amy tries to undermine her.
Shift the conversation away from competition and shame. Invite others to reject envy and spread compassion instead.
